conversation.en_sentence: I still think the first trial export should target Japanese people living in Singapore and export the products we sell in Japan today would be good.

conversation.en_sentence: By targeting Japanese people, we can simply export the existing products that we have.

conversation.en_sentence: If we narrow down our sales point to places where Japanese people tend to gather in the local area, we should be able to reduce our expenses too.

conversation.en_sentence: The new items are not too pricey compared to the other items, so people might consider buying them.
